mapper.select: select role.id,role.role_name,role.fk_parent_id from sys_en_role role order by role.order_num

select en_user.id,en_user.user_name, en_user.login_name,en_user.password, en_user.remark,en_user.user_status,en_user.theme, en_user.add_time,en_user.update_time from sys_en_user en_user
en_user.login_name = #{loginName}

select menu.id,menu.menu_identify,menu.text,menu.link,menu.qtip,menu.is_leaf, menu.is_expanded,menu.fk_parent_id,menu.is_self_url from sys_en_user u,sys_en_role role,sys_en_menu menu,sys_re_user_role ur,sys_re_role_menu rm where u.id = ur.fk_user_id and ur.fk_role_id = role.id and role.id = rm.fk_role_id and rm.fk_menu_id = menu.id and u.id = #{userId} and u.user_status = '1' and role.role_status = '1' order by menu.fk_parent_id asc,menu.order_num asc
